questions.author: Krishan Sharma
questions.content: How many players are in a cricket team?

questions.author: Vanessa Palacios Sharma
questions.content: How many cups are in a gallon?

questions.author: Nivedita Kapoor
questions.content: Where can I buy Indian groceries in Portland?

answers.reply: There are eleven players in a cricket team.
A gallon has a total of 16 cups.
You can find Indian groceries in Beaverton or Hillsboro.
